masjids.name: Al-Madani Masjid
masjids.address: 1 Whittle Parkway, Slough, Berkshire, SL1 6FE, United Kingdom
masjids.sadaqahQuoteTranslation: The example of those who spend their wealth in the way of Allah is like a seed which grows seven ears; in every ear is a hundred grains.
masjids.zakatQuoteArabic: خُذْ مِنْ أَمْوَالِهِمْ صَدَقَةً تُطَهِّرُهُمْ وَتُزَكِّيهِمْ بِهَا
masjids.zakatQuoteTranslation: Take from their wealth a charity by which you purify them and cause them to grow.
